quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因不认识“tamper”将“witness tampering”直译为“证人篡改证词”，或因“tampering”与“testifying”形近而误解为“证人作证”
quiz_item.sentence: The prosecutor accused the defendant of **witness tampering** after evidence showed he had offered money to the key witness to change her story.

option.definition: 干扰证人（法律术语，指威胁或贿赂证人以影响其证词）
